languages.text: {n}Переговорщик чуть склоняет голову, не отрываясь глядя на Маражая.{/n} "Приветствую, Маражай Эзирраэш, дракон кабала Опустошительной бури".

traits.locale_text: {n}Переговорщик чуть склоняет голову, не отрываясь глядя на Маражая.{/n} "Приветствую, Маражай Эзирраэш, дракон кабала Опустошительной бури".

languages.text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."
languages.original_text: {n}Переговорщик чуть склоняет голову, не отрываясь глядя на Маражая.{/n} "Приветствую, Маражай Эзирраэш, дракон кабала Опустошительной бури".

traits.locale_text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, looking Marazhai in the eye.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."

{n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."

languages.text: {n}Der Verhandlungsführer neigt leicht den Kopf, ohne die Augen von Marazhais zu nehmen.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon der Kabale des plündernden Sturms."
languages.original_text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Verhandlungsführer neigt leicht den Kopf, ohne die Augen von Marazhais zu nehmen.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon der Kabale des plündernden Sturms."

languages.text: {n}谈判者微微低下头，但目光依然盯着玛拉斋。{/n}“向你致意，玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官。”
languages.original_text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}谈判者微微低下头，但目光依然盯着玛拉斋。{/n}“向你致意，玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官。”

languages.text: {n}Le négociateur incline légèrement la tête, ses yeux plongés dans ceux de Marazhai.{/n} « Salutations, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le négociateur incline légèrement la tête, ses yeux plongés dans ceux de Marazhai.{/n} « Salutations, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse. »

languages.text: {n}El negociador inclina ligeramente la cabeza sin apartar sus ojos de los de Marazhai.{/n} «Salve, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracón de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora».
languages.original_text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}El negociador inclina ligeramente la cabeza sin apartar sus ojos de los de Marazhai.{/n} «Salve, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracón de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora».

languages.text: {n}交渉人は視線をマラズハイから逸らさずに、わずかに頭を下げる。{/n}「ご挨拶申し上げます。マラザイ・アエジレシュ、リーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団のドラコンよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: {n}交渉人は視線をマラズハイから逸らさずに、わずかに頭を下げる。{/n}「ご挨拶申し上げます。マラザイ・アエジレシュ、リーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団のドラコンよ」

languages.text: {n}Delege, gözlerini Marazahi'dan ayırmadan, başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n} "Selamlarımı sunarım Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı Drakon'u."
languages.original_text: {n}The negotiator bows his head slightly, his eyes not leaving Marazhai's.{/n} "Greetings, Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest."
